trans-unit.source: Provides a simple list of delegates.
trans-unit.target: 提供簡單的委派清單。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This class uses a linear search algorithm to find entries in the list of delegates.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會使用線性搜尋演算法來尋找項目清單中的委派。

trans-unit.source: A linear search algorithm is inefficient when working with a large number of entries.
trans-unit.target: 使用大量的項目時，線性搜尋演算法沒有效率。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you have a large list, finding entries is slow.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您有大型的清單，尋找項目會變慢。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Adds a delegate to the list.
trans-unit.target: 將委派加入至清單。

trans-unit.source: The object that owns the event.
trans-unit.target: 擁有事件的物件。

trans-unit.source: The delegate to add to the list.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至清單的委派。

trans-unit.source: Adds a list of delegates to the current list.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的清單中的委派清單。

trans-unit.source: The list to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的清單。

trans-unit.source: Disposes the delegate list.
trans-unit.target: 處置委派清單。

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>呼叫 Dispose

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法會使<xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList> so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 Dispose 之後，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>讓它所佔用的記憶體可由記憶體回收收回。</xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫 Dispose 之後，再放開您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList> is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList> object's destructor.
trans-unit.target: 否則，資源<xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>是使用之前，將不會釋放記憶體回收集合呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>物件的解構函式。</xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the delegate for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定之物件的委派。

trans-unit.source: When the key is not found in the list and you provide a delegate to set the value of the key, then the key is added to the top of the list and assigned to the delegate as its value.
trans-unit.target: 當清單中找不到索引鍵並提供委派設定的值的索引鍵，然後金鑰加入至清單頂端，並指派給委派，做為其值。

trans-unit.source: An object to find in the list.
trans-unit.target: 要在清單中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: The delegate for the specified key, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a delegate does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 指定之索引鍵，委派或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果委派不存在。

trans-unit.source: Removes a delegate from the list.
trans-unit.target: 從清單中移除的委派。

trans-unit.source: The object that owns the event.
trans-unit.target: 擁有事件的物件。

trans-unit.source: The delegate to remove from the list.
trans-unit.target: 要從清單中移除的委派。
